subject: Suitability of the OED for pronunciation checking (was: something else)
msgSnippet: ... This applies to an old public-domain version of the text, right? I d hope this isn t true of the OED 3rd ed., (⌐ 2010 and 2012) that ships with OS X
messageBody:
--- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, John Cowan <cowan@...> wrote:
> The OED, though great for history, can't be safely used for pronunciation:
> too many of its pronunciations are a hundred years old and more.

This applies to an old public-domain version of the text, right?

I'd hope this isn't true of the OED 3rd ed., (© 2010 and 2012) that ships with OS X Mavericks
